school: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology and Education
get in touch: Get in touch with me so we can collaborate on your next project!
about-desc: As a self-taught front-end developer with no prior experience, I have a strong passion for using my creativity and problem-solving skills to build visually appealing and user-friendly websites. I am constantly seeking new opportunities to learn and grow my skills, and I am excited to bring my enthusiasm and determination to any project I take on.
about-desc2: Before I knew programming, I did many different jobs, but I gradually realized that being a programmer is the path that I am passionate about and want to pursue to the end.
school-desc: Majored in Control Engineering and Automation
Project that I currently working on: Project that I currently working on
My project description: I have completed projects such as Tinyzone-clone, Personal Portfolio with basic functions such as Login, watching movies, Dark Mode... Besides, I have 2 projects under development: LPS shop and S media with the desire to turn them into fullstack projects.
Skill Description: I have good knowledge and solid foundation of front-end skills such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React Js. Besides, I am learning and have been using Tailwind CSS, SASS and Material UI. I have basic knowledge in back-end field with Node Js, Express Js, MongoDB as well as Typescript programming language.
quote: Study while others are sleeping, work while others are loafing, prepare while others are playing, and dream while others are wishing.
